snippet: Past and present practitioners of fantasy fiction in print and movies reacted to the views of the meteor that whistled and boomed across Russian skies on Friday with awe — and some new ideas.
abstract: Past and present practitioners of fantasy fiction in print and movies react to views of meteor that whistled and boomed across Russian skies with awe, and some new ideas.

byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes and Michael Cieply contributed reporting from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: Past and present practitioners of fantasy fiction in print and movies reacted to the views of the meteor that whistled and boomed across Russian skies on Friday with awe — and some new ideas.
